name: Geree, The Headhuntaur
text:
Dragonform (Whenever this creature attacks, if defending player's life total is less than half its starting life total, this creature gets +1/+1 and flying until end of turn.)
Whenever another creature dies, create a Head token. (It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”)
